Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.repositories

Interface AccessesRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<AccessEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AccessEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<AccessEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<AccessEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<AccessEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<AccessEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<AccessEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface AccessesRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AccessEntity,Long>
Repository interface for accessing visit access records from the database.

      Parameters:
      authEntity - the authorization entity to search for.
      Returns:
      a list of AccessEntity that match the given authorization entity.

      Returns:

      Searches for AccessEntity by either the visitor's name or last name.
      Parameters:
      name - the first name of the visitor.
      lastName - the last name of the visitor.
      Returns:
      a list of AccessEntity that match the visitor's first name or last name.

    • findAll

      pageable - Pagination information.
      Returns:

    • findAccessCountsByHourNative

      @Query(value="SELECT DATE_FORMAT(action_date, \'%H:00\') AS hour, COUNT(*) AS count FROM accesses WHERE action_date BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(action_date, \'%H:00\') ORDER BY hour", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findAccessCountsByHourNative(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate)
      Retrieves access counts grouped by hour within the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive).
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive).
      Returns:
      a list of Object arrays where each array contains: String: formatted hour - Long: count of accesses during that hour.

    • findAccessCountsByDayOfWeekNative

      @Query(value="SELECT DAYOFWEEK(action_date) AS dayOfWeek, SUM(CASE WHEN action = \'ENTRY\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS entryCount, SUM(CASE WHEN action = \'EXIT\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exitCount FROM accesses WHERE action_date BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate GROUP BY DAYOFWEEK(action_date) ORDER BY dayOfWeek", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findAccessCountsByDayOfWeekNative(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate)
      Retrieves access counts grouped by weekday within the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive).
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive).
      Returns:
      a list of Object arrays where each array contains: String: formatted week - Long: count of accesses during that week.

    • countEntriesAndExitsBetweenDates

      @Query("SELECT new ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.dtos.common.EntryReport.EntryReport(SUM(CASE WHEN a.action = \'ENTRY\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN a.action = \'EXIT\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) FROM AccessEntity a WHERE a.actionDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate") EntryReport countEntriesAndExitsBetweenDates(@Param("startDate") LocalDateTime startDate, @Param("endDate") LocalDateTime endDate)
      Counts entries and exits between two dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - date to start counting from.
      endDate - date to end counting.
      Returns:
      a EntryReport the count of entries and exits.

    • findAccessCountsByVisitorType

      @Query(value="SELECT auth.visitor_type AS visitorType, SUM(CASE WHEN a.action = \'ENTRY\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS entryCount, SUM(CASE WHEN a.action = \'EXIT\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exitCount FROM accesses a JOIN auths as auth ON a.auth_id = auth.id WHERE a.action_date BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate GROUP BY auth.visitor_type ORDER BY visitorType", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findAccessCountsByVisitorType(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate)
      Retrieves access counts grouped by hour within the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive).
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive).
      Returns:
      a list of Object arrays where each array contains: String: formatted hour - Long: count of accesses during that hour.

    • findAccessCountsByGroup

      @Query("SELECT FUNCTION(\'DATE_FORMAT\', a.actionDate, :dateFormat) AS day, COUNT(a) AS count FROM AccessEntity a JOIN a.auth auth WHERE a.actionDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate and (:visitorType is null or a.auth.visitorType = :visitorType) and (:action is null or a.action = :action)GROUP BY FUNCTION(\'DATE_FORMAT\', a.actionDate, :dateFormat) ORDER BY day") List<Object[]> findAccessCountsByGroup(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate, @Param("visitorType") VisitorType visitorType, @Param("action") ActionTypes action, @Param("dateFormat") String dateFormat)
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive).
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive).
      visitorType - the type of visitor to filter by (nullable).
      action - the action type to filter by (nullable).
      dateFormat - represent a format of group
      Returns:
      a list of Object arrays where each array contains:

    • findInconsistentAccessCountsByGroup

      @Query("SELECT FUNCTION(\'DATE_FORMAT\', a.actionDate, :dateFormat) AS day, COUNT(a) AS count FROM AccessEntity a JOIN a.auth auth WHERE a.actionDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate and (:visitorType is null or a.auth.visitorType = :visitorType) and (:action is null or a.action = :action) AND a.isInconsistent = true GROUP BY FUNCTION(\'DATE_FORMAT\', a.actionDate, :dateFormat) ORDER BY day") List<Object[]> findInconsistentAccessCountsByGroup(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate, @Param("visitorType") VisitorType visitorType, @Param("action") ActionTypes action, @Param("dateFormat") String dateFormat)
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive).
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive).
      visitorType - the type of visitor to filter by (nullable).
      action - the action type to filter by (nullable).
      dateFormat - represent a format of group
      Returns:
      list an inconsistent access grouped by period

    • findLateAccessCountsByGroup

      @Query("SELECT FUNCTION(\'DATE_FORMAT\', a.actionDate, :dateFormat) AS day, COUNT(a) AS count FROM AccessEntity a JOIN a.auth auth WHERE a.actionDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate and (:visitorType is null or a.auth.visitorType = :visitorType) and (:action is null or a.action = :action) AND a.notified = true GROUP BY FUNCTION(\'DATE_FORMAT\', a.actionDate, :dateFormat) ORDER BY day") List<Object[]> findLateAccessCountsByGroup(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate, @Param("visitorType") VisitorType visitorType, @Param("action") ActionTypes action, @Param("dateFormat") String dateFormat)
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive).
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive).
      visitorType - the type of visitor to filter by (nullable).
      action - the action type to filter by (nullable).
      dateFormat - represent a format of group
      Returns:
      list an inconsistent access grouped by period

    • findAccessInconsistentCounts

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(a) AS count FROM AccessEntity a WHERE a.actionDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate and (:visitorType is null or a.auth.visitorType = :visitorType) and a.isInconsistent = true") Long findAccessInconsistentCounts(@Param("fromDate") LocalDateTime fromDate, @Param("toDate") LocalDateTime toDate, @Param("visitorType") VisitorType visitorType)
      Retrieves the count of inconsistent access events within the specified date range and filtered by visitor type.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - the start date and time (inclusive) of the range
      toDate - the end date and time (inclusive) of the range
      visitorType - the type of visitor to filter by
      Returns:
      the count of inconsistent access events that match the given criteria

    • findAccessByAuthIdDesc

      @Query("SELECT a FROM AccessEntity a WHERE a.auth.authId = :authId ORDER BY a.actionDate DESC") List<AccessEntity> findAccessByAuthIdDesc(@Param("authId") Long authId)
      Retrieves the count of late access events within the specified date range and filtered by visitor type.
      Parameters:
      authId - the authId
      Returns:
      the count of late access events that match the given criteria
